title: When I take a selfie video on my Google Pixel 3xl, I would like to cartoonize it. How can I do this?
content: When I take a selfie video on my Google Pixel 3xl, I would like to cartoonize it. How can I do this? Is there an App or something that will add a filter. After the selfie video is done, I would like to cartoonize it, or I would like it to just cartoonize as it is bring shot. Is there a way, or an app to do this? Thank you.
